Lawbreaker's Doom.name: Lawbreaker's Doom
Lawbreaker's Doom.flavor: You designate one enemy as the target of your attention. This evildoer will not escape justice.
Lawbreaker's Doom.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target with an attack, you deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Lawbreaker's Doom.special: When the target is reduced to 0 hit points, you regain the use of this power.

Dispensed Justice.name: Dispensed Justice
Dispensed Justice.flavor: There can be no justice without order, and your strike drives home this point.
Dispensed Justice.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Dispensed Justice.special: You can instead use this power as an immediate interrupt with the following trigger.
Dispensed Justice.trigger: The target of your lawbreaker’s doom power is adjacent to you and makes an attack that does not include you.

Red Death.name: Red Death
keywords: Close burst 1  Target: Each enemy in the burst  Effect: The target is marked and is subject to your lawbreaker’s doom power until the end of your next turn.
Red Death.effect: The target is marked and is subject to your lawbreaker’s doom power until the end of your next turn.

Blood Oath Fulfilled.name: Blood Oath Fulfilled
Blood Oath Fulfilled.flavor: Crimes have been committed, and it’s up to you to make sure these criminals pay the price.
Blood Oath Fulfilled.special: You can shift 1 square before the attack.
Blood Oath Fulfilled.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone and cannot stand (save ends).
